column5: 2006 Construction. 3 Br., 2 Ba., full kitchen. Balcony and Master with ocean view. Travertine floors, granite counter tops, high ceilings, jetted tub and bidet in both bathrooms. Exercise room and two pools (kid pool and lap pool.) Sleeps up to 8. Two assigned parking spaces.  Convenient to public beaches, fishing pier, Schlitterbahn water park, Moody Gardens and downtown Galveston. Walking distance to fishing pier, restaurants and putt-putt golf. 8 guest maximum, please.
